messages.subject: Two New Things
messages.msgSnippet: There s a new description of unschooling published this week.  Robin Bentley found it and sent it to me. http://zenhabits.net or for a longterm link:
messages.messageBody:
There's a new description of unschooling published this week. Robin Bentley found it and sent it to me.
http://zenhabits.net
or for a longterm link:
http://zenhabits.net/unschool/

And bigger than that, Pam Laricchia has created an set of introductory e-mails about unschooling. I haven't seen off of it, but I've seen some and it seems wonderful. So anyone here who's new to unschooling might want to sign up for this series. It comes to each person individually, so it's not a problem to sign up later.

http://www.livingjoyfully.ca (the middle link on top; I LOVE her opening screen at her website, and she made it herself)

Either of those could be sent to friends or relatives who ask, but who don't want information as extensive as my website or Joyce's!

Sandra
